nodes.text: The Nuro pirates were a group of pirates who were active in the galaxy during the Clone Wars. The Nuro pirates, like many other groups, received support from the Confederacy of Independent Systems and were encouraged by Count Dooku to harass Galactic Republic supply lines during the war.

The Nuro pirates were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The pirates initially appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the massive online multiplayer game Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures developed by Sony Online Entertainment and released by LucasArts in 2010.
